issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on display people does not do anything.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:

Iphone:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the contacts table row.
7.Tap on the display people table row.
8.You will see that tapping on display people does not do anything.

Windows Phone Mango:
1.Unable to scroll the page down thus cant unhide the contacts table row.Thus,further execution of the test case is blocked.

Actual result:
1.Tapping on display people does not do anything.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on display people should get us a contact list.
2.Tapping on a contact from the list should get the address of the selected person.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Phone-->Contacts-->Display people:Tapping on display people does not do anything.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
windows Phone mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
